title: Support system claims my email is unverified and will not send verification email
body:
First of all, I can't even log in to the support page on Chrome - it immediately redirects to telling me I need a verified email without presenting me with the login page.

I can log in on IE, but then it tells me I need a verified email to proceed (the email has been verified in the past, but whatever).

It claimed to have sent a verification email to the registered email address (I confirmed that I was checking the correct email). No such email arrived, in inbox, spam, etc. I manually told it to send a verification email. Similarly, no such email arrived.

I can't submit a support ticket about this, nor can I submit a support ticket about what I actually care about.

Edit: I'm gonna post one of these every day until something happens.

replies.body: Visit [this link](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect) to verify your email. Let me know if you've successfully verified your email or not.
Thanks for the help. The link below worked, although it was the exact same page that failed previously, so I don't know if it was a momentary issue or not.
